raw_body: GOONETILLEKE MARY MAGDALENE, passed away peacefully in the early hours of 18th February 2024 at her home ’Mount Vernon’ in Waragoda, Kelaniya. Beloved wife to late Clive Maurice Goonetilleke and most cherished mother to Tishan Goonetilleke (son), his wife Rosemarie Goonetilleke, Niranjala Perera (daughter) and her husband Dushan Perera, grandmother to Denise, Mavin, Nadeera, Dylan, Naomi and Tamara, great grandmother to Elijah, Isabella, Gabriel,
